name: Bakenstein's Monsters
description:
This game is created for the Godot Wild Jam #53

Discord: resinten#4209, stunkel#9715

Inspired by Super Auto Pets and Overcooked, Bakenstein challenges the player to cook monster meat and toss it in the assembler to build the best monsters possible. The scientist is in danger, trying to finish his experiments while an onslaught of monsters beats down his door. Bake equally terrifying monsters to defend him so he can change the world.
